name: Rescue Heroes: Molten Menace
summary: Kaboom! A volcano erupted near the quiet town of Misty Peaks! Spring into action with the Rescue Heroes Team and help save the town! Race against a river of lava with Jake Justice, and soar above rooftops with Ariel Flyer in search of stranded people and pets. Use your quick wits and problem-solving skills to complete each rescue mission and save the day!
